title: Which Big Ten team will challenge Ohio State?
description:
Wendi Nix, Desmond Howard, and David Pollack discuss whether Ohio State can regain control over the Big Ten or if Michigan can defend its conference title. Plus, the crew picks whether some Big Ten teams will go over or under their projected win totals for the season. Also, a preview of Nebraska and Northwestern as they both arrive for their Week 0 matchup in Dublin, Ireland.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses expectations for Ohio State and other potential Big Ten threats
